defaultMessage: Drop an image file here, or click to upload a file (max size: {image_max_size}, allowed extensions: {image_extensions}, allowed dimensions between {image_min_dimensions} and {image_max_dimensions} pixels)
Drop a video file here, or click to upload a file (max size: {video_max_size}, allowed extensions: {video_extensions})
The file cannot have type "{extension}". Please try with the following file types: {allowed_types}.
The file size should be less than {size}. Please try with a smaller file.
